meanings.definition: The shared understanding or agreement between individuals.
meanings.sent1: In the group therapy session, the intersubjectivities among the participants helped them support each other.
meanings.sent2: The intersubjectivities between the siblings made it easy for them to communicate effectively.
meanings.sent3: The intersubjectivities at the family dinner led to everyone agreeing on the movie choice.
meanings.sent4: The intersubjectivities in the classroom created a harmonious learning environment.
meanings.sent5: The intersubjectivities in the team allowed them to work together seamlessly.

meanings.definition: The relationships and interactions between different subjective experiences.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the intersubjectivities between cultures can lead to greater empathy.
meanings.sent2: The therapist explored the intersubjectivities of the patient's past traumas.
meanings.sent3: The intersubjectivities between the characters in the novel added depth to the storyline.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the intersubjectivities of art and emotion can be a profound experience.
meanings.sent5: The intersubjectivities between the two artists influenced their collaborative project.
